alert.note: Alert for Callahan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 10:29PM CDT until May 07 at 11:15PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: The National Weather Service in San Angelo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Callahan County in west central Texas... * Until 1115 PM CDT. * At 1028 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Admiral, or near Rowden, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Putnam around 1100 PM CDT. Atwell around 1110 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Admiral and I-20 Near The Callahan-Eastland County Line. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 312 and 323. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
